title: why wont my emotes work
body: I have 3 emotes and for some reason and the button T wont work it would not bring up it and i cant find it in the menu in commutactions..{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: As long as you have it equipped in your collections, you should be fine.  Keep in mind it won't work in practice tool or custom games, though!

Currently, the mastery emote doesn't work while dead either.
Pretty much only time I use it, so it was kinda easy to spot.

Also, when I don't have a mastery emote on a champion, the client doesn't tell me

"You have not unlocked BM on this champion!"

...anymore. 
_It's a great meme._
